text: Steve Gillespie (July 22, 1963 â€“ January 18, 2020), better known under the ring name Dr. Hannibal, was a Canadian professional wrestler. He was born in Calgary, Alberta. He wrestled from 1987 until his retirement in 2013. He worked in promotions such as Stampede Wrestling, Canadian Rocky Mountain Wrestling, Frontier Martial-Arts Wrestling (FMW) and the World Wrestling Federation (WWF). On January 18, 2020, Gillespie was found dead in his car in Calgary. He was 56. ==References== Category:1963 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Canadian professional wrestlers Category:Sportspeople from Calgary
title: Dr. Hannibal
